title: 3 dances - Gulpilil
creator_credit: David Roberts, Tom Manefield, Commonwealth Department of Aboriginal Affairs and Film Australia
brief_description: David Gulpilil performs three Aboriginal dances, Emu, Kangaroo and Fish. The first two are solo performances by Gulpilil and are closer to mime than dance. The third is a group dance with some of the children from Bamyili where Gulpilil lives in the Northern Territory.
creator_credit_for_label: David Roberts, Tom Manefield, Commonwealth Department of Aboriginal Affairs and Film Australia
